dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5250 IH: To reauthorize the Rural Economic Area Partnership Zones Program through fiscal year 2023.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Faso (for himself and Mr. Welch) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Rural Economic Area Partnership Zones Program through fiscal year 2023.

section.header: Reauthorization of the Rural Economic Area Partnership Zones Program
section.text: Section 310B(j) of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act (7 U.S.C. 1932(j)) is amended by striking 2018 and inserting 2023.
